Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Bow = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local quiver local quiverWeld local arrows = {}
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Tool.Enabled = true
arrow = Instance.new("Part") arrow.FormFactor = 3 arrow.Shape = "Block" arrow.Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 3.0, 0.5) arrow.CanCollide = false arrow.Name = "Arrow"
arrowMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") arrowMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=49925357" arrowMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=49846927" arrowMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.5, 0.5) arrowMesh.Parent = arrow
local arrowWeld
local fireArrow
function shoot(arrow, direction) vCharacter = Tool.Parent if vCharacter == nil or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") == nil then return end
vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer == nil then return end
local spawnPos = vCharacter.Torso.Position spawnPos = spawnPos + direction.unit * 7.0
arrow.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + direction) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, math.pi/2, 0)
local arrowFloat = Instance.new("BodyForce") arrowFloat.force = Vector3.new(0.0, arrow:GetMass() * 196.1, 0.0) arrowFloat.Parent = arrow
arrow.Velocity = direction.unit * 75.0 arrow.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0.0, 0.0, 0.0) arrow.Name ="arrow" arrow.Parent = game.Workspace arrow.CanCollide = false
local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = vPlayer creatorTag.Parent = arrow
local newScript = Tool:FindFirstChild("OnTouchScript"):Clone() newScript.Disabled = false newScript.Parent = arrow
fireArrow = Tool:FindFirstChild("FireArrow") if fireArrow.Value == 1 then fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Parent = arrow end debris:addItem(arrow, 5) end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso == nil then return end
myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end arrowClone = arrow:Clone()
wait(0.6) target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint direction = (target - vCharacter.Torso.Position).unit shoot(arrowClone, direction)
wait(2.0)
Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() print("On equip") vCharacter = Tool.Parent torso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso ~= nil and vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Quiver") == nil then quiver = Instance.new("Part") quiver.Name = "Quiver" quiver.Shape = "Block" quiver.FormFactor = 3 quiver.Size = Vector3.new(1.2, 0.5, 2.0) quiver.CanCollide = false quiver.Parent = vCharacter
quiverMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") quiverMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=49848728" quiverMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=49848743" quiverMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.2,1.2,1.2) quiverMesh.Parent = quiver
quiverWeld = Instance.new("Weld") quiverWeld.Name = "QuiverHolder" quiverWeld.Part0 = torso quiverWeld.Part1 = quiver quiverWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, -0.8, 0.0)) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, math.pi, 0) quiverWeld.Parent = torso
rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") leftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") if rightArm then rightGrip = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") end if rightGrip then rightGrip.Parent = leftArm rightGrip.Name = "LeftGrip" rightGrip.Part0 = leftArm rightGrip.Part1 = Bow end
for i = 1, 3 do local sign = 0 if i > 1 then if i%2 == 0 then sign = -1 else sign = 1 end end arrows[i] = Instance.new("Part") arrows[i].Name = "Arrow" arrows[i].Shape = "Block" arrows[i].FormFactor = 3 arrows[i].Size = Vector3.new(0.8, 0.1, 0.1) arrows[i].CanCollide = false arrows[i].Parent = quiver
arrowMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") arrowMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=49849692" arrowMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=49846927" arrowMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.5, 0.5) arrowMesh.Parent = arrows[i]
arrowWeld = Instance.new("Weld") arrowWeld.Name = "ArrowHolder"..i arrowWeld.Part0 = quiver arrowWeld.Part1 = arrows[i] arrowWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(2.5, 0.8, 0)) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, sign * math.pi/20, 0) arrowWeld.Parent = quiver end
end end
function onUnequipped() if vCharacter then torso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") end
if torso then quiver = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Quiver") quiverWeld = torso:FindFirstChild("QuiverHolder") end
if quiver then quiver:Remove() end if quiverWeld then quiverWeld:Remove() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent local Bow = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local walkAnim local arrowAnim
local fireArrow local co
local debounce = false
function onKeyDown(key) if key:lower() == "q" then if debounce == false then fireArrow = Tool:FindFirstChild("FireArrow") if fireArrow then fireArrow.Value = 1 co = coroutine.create(reset) coroutine.resume(co) debounce = true end end end end
function reset() wait(5) fireArrow = Tool:FindFirstChild("FireArrow") if fireArrow then fireArrow.Value = 0 end wait(5) debounce = false end
function onActivatedLocal() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end arrowAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.ArrowAnim) if arrowAnim then arrowAnim:Play() end
wait(1.0)
end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid then walkAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.BowWalk) walkAnim:Play() end
mouse.KeyDown:connect(onKeyDown) end
function onUnequippedLocal() if walkAnim then walkAnim:Stop() end if arrowAnim then arrowAnim:Stop()end
fireArrow = Tool:FindFirstChild("FireArrow") if fireArrow then fireArrow.Value = 0 end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivatedLocal) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local arrow = script.Parent
local damage = 50
function onTouch(hit) if hit.Parent then vChar = hit.Parent humanoid = vChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
if humanoid ~= nil then tag = arrow:FindFirstChild("creator") if tag then tag.Parent = humanoid end if hit.Name == "Head" then damage = 100 end humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) damage = 50
fire = arrow:FindFirstChild("Fire") if fire then fire.Parent = vChar.Torso newScript = script.BurnScript newScript.Parent = vChar newScript.Disabled = false end end arrow:Remove() end end
arrow.Touched:connect(onTouch)

vCharacter = script.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso")
local count = 5
while myHumanoid and count > 0 do print(count) myHumanoid:TakeDamage(10) count = count - 1 wait(1.0) end
if myTorso then fire = myTorso:FindFirstChild("Fire") if fire then fire:Remove() end end
wait(1.0)
script:Remove()
